1�You dipped the #???? into the spring water.Letters appeared on the scroll!
1�Oh my Gob! You're one of those adventurerurers, aren't ya?You got nothin' on me, ?[man./lady.] I was just mindin' my own businesesess, lookin' for junk an' stuff.
1�Hey, watch out. You don't wanna fight me. I'll turn you into meat jerky!Wait, how about you and me be friends instead? Sound good?
1�I travel all over the world and hear lots of differererent stories. I even hear your stories. I can tell you one, if you want.
1�Do you want to hear a story?No, thank you.Let's hear one.

1�What story would you like to be told?On second thought, maybe later.The Rank 2 Final Mission(pt.1).The Rank 2 Final Mission(pt.2).The Secret Weapon(pt.1).The Secret Weapon(pt.2).Amanomurakumo.Beyond Infinity(pt.1).Beyond Infinity(pt.2).?@
1�Oh...Well, if that's the case, I'm outta here.
1�Oh...Well, if that's the case, I'm outta here.
1�Oh...Well, if that's the case, I'm outta here.
1�Oh...Well, if that's the case, I'm outta here.
1�Oh...Well, if that's the case, I'm outta here.
1�Now, listen close...
1�You hear a voice from out of nowhere...
1�You hear a voice from out of nowhere...
1�You hear a voice from out of nowhere...
1�You hear a voice from out of nowhere...
1�You hear a voice from out of nowhere...
1�You hear a voice from out of nowhere...
1�You hear a voice from out of nowhere...
1�You hear a voice from out of nowhere...
1�You hear a voice from out of nowhere...
1�You hear a voice from out of nowhere...
1�You hear a voice from out of nowhere...
1�You hear a voice from out of nowhere...
1�You hear a voice from out of nowhere...
1�You hear a voice from out of nowhere...
1�This place is...?
1�I see...You must be the new wielder for these.
1�Yes, with your fighting spirit I believe you will be able to master the #????.
1�The #???? have long accompanied me, along both rough and gentle paths. It is not easy to give them up, but...here.
1�They belong to you now. I ask that you consider my...Ah, but that is past now. I bid you farewell....
1�Eh? What?
1�Oh.You must be this one's new owner.
1�With your dagger skills, you'll make a perfect wielder for the #????.
1�It is most difficult to give up a weapon that has seen me through so many tight spots, but you have earned it.
1�Treat her well...
1�...What has happened to me?
1�I see, you are the sword's new owner?
1�Well, this is most encouraging!A master of swordplay such as yourself should have no trouble wielding #????.
1�When the world lies in chaos, this blade appears before the one meant to wield it.It is yours...Restore order to Vana'diel!
1�And now I, too, can rest unburdened...
1�Who are you?
1�This must be some sort of joke.You are the new wielder of this weapon?
1�Hmmm, perhaps I have misjudged you.With your level of skill, you may be able to handle this beastly blade, and have the will to control its awesome power.
1�However, this is a magical blade. It is a sword that calls upon destruction. Its malice will gnaw away at your body and soul even as you topple enemies with its strength.
1�Do not forget this truth! Keep it always in your mind.My regards go with you, stranger...
1�What the...?
1�Ah, now I see.The wheel has turned.
1�Truthfully spoken, I am thankful.?#???? is a splendid axe, but ever does it hunger.
1�I have taken many lives to sate its need, and have reached the end of my strength.
1�You have my gratitude.You have freed me from my nightmare, and now I can sleep with a tranquil spirit...
1�...This is...Jeuno!?Have I finally returned?
1�I... Nobody can see me.This is merely a reflection of reality.Which means you are the one to inherit the axe.
1�Hmm. With your polished skills, you will make a fine master for #????.
1�The one who wields this axe must also be beautiful to look upon. Apparently, I was a suitable candidate. Do you not agree?
1�Congratulations.I expect you to perform great deeds from this day onwards.I also ask that someday you use #???? to avenge the Hydra Corps...
1�Such a long dream I was having...
1�It was a dream held captive by a shrouded world.No. I must accept that it was no dream.
1�And you? Do you seek the same darkness that I did...It seems you have already found your way to #????.
1�Very well, I will pass it on to you.But do not forget how much blood your companions spilled in your search for its unholy strength.
1�And think long and hard on whether or not this power should be used. Do not end up like me...
1�Hello?Is it possible that I...
1�But, no.I have not returned to this realm...You. You are to be my successor?
1�You certainly seem to have the required skill with the lance. Enough to convince #???? to lend you its power, at any rate.
1�Having this spear on the battlefield makes you a match for almost any opponent.
1�Think well on what this means, and on how a weapon like this should be used.You have my admiration, adventurer. You have done well...
1�It is a pity, indeed.
1�This day has come far too soon for my liking.
1�However, you are a master of the ninja trade.I concede that you will make a fitting wielder of the #????.
1�Take this blade as your own.Travel far down the path of the ninja.
1�I will be watching you from the shadows...
1�What is going on here?
1�Ah, my successor has come.
1�I sought to master the way of the samurai, and traveled to the Far East for training. By the time I had gained the #???? and returned to my home, the Great War had begun.
1�When I think on it, my life has been a long road of trials. But to see the arrival of my successor makes me feel that all has not been in vain.
1�You have my gratitude.Farewell, #????...
1�Hwaah!
1�Just when I thought I had finally returned to this world, I find you standing here, ready to snatch my precious staff away.
1�Well, it's for the best, I suppose.In my current state, #???? is nothing more than an ornament, its power going to waste.
1�I entrust this staff to you!Take up #????,  , and bind it to you in a contract of blood!
1�I take my leave of you now.I only wish that I was able to stay a little longer...
1�Where is this place?
1�Of course. How could I forget.I am Ghebben. I was entrusted with this bow by a warrior of the Far East.
1�Your hands tell me that your skill in archery is far from ordinary.#???? will fit snugly into your sure grasp.
1�However, this bow belongs to Sir Nasu, the warrior of whom I spoke.You must remember that you are merely its keeper for a time.
1�Farewell...
1�Why'd you have to go and wake me up? I was having the most relaxing sleep.Oh, this place looks familiar...
1�Hm? You think you're the one who's going to take up my gun?
1�You do seem to have a fair eye for marksmanship. And #???? would look perfect nestled in the crook of your arm...
1�Well, I have no more use for this weapon, so I guess you can have it. But there is one thing I want you to remember.

1�This gun is a fearsome weapon that unleashes a blast upon your enemies many thousands of times greater in strength than the tiny effort it takes you to pull the trigger. Needless to say, be careful who you aim it at...
1�Hello there.I am Terounalivet, a military musician of the Hydra Corps.
1�You've never heard of me?Before joining the army I was quite the famous bard, mobbed by fans in every town I passed through.
1�To be completely truthful, I am heartbroken to be giving up the #????, the most famous of instruments, even to a fellow bard.
1�But an instrument only shows its true worth when being played. This horn should be delighted to be passed on to such a talent as yourself.
1�She has a capricious soul, but do treat her well. And do not forget that even without a raging battle, you can still play a tune for the simple enjoyment of those around you...
